amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exception for regulations which are intended to promote energy efficiency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to provide an exception for regulations which are intended to promote energy efficiency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 242 (Roll no. 517).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 242 (Roll no. 517).
